name: Hamsino
description:
Hamsino is a casino where the dice are dealt by kung-fu fighting hamsters, and the audience loves the free show.

An abitious Smash-like minigame where you roll dice by comboing them, and rack up the highest score in an endless tug-of-war against the clock.

A robust moveset with wall jumping, double jumping, diving, 6 grounded moves and 6 aerial moves.

As per any good smash-like, Hamsino is all about giving the audience a good show.

Anyone with Smash experience should feel right at home, and can at least beat by score of 186.

May as well download Hasmino and roll (or punch?) the dice.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
